text: [Ej pajomʙar] Agar az musrikon ʙipursi: «Ci kase osmonho va zaminro ofaridaast»? Musallaman, megujand: «Alloh taolo». Ba onon ʙigu: «Pas, ʙa nazari sumo, agar Alloh taolo noxusi va rance ʙarojam ʙixohad, ojo on ci ʙa coji Alloh taolo [ʙa nijois] mexoned, metavonand oseʙasro ʙartaraf kunand? Jo agar Alloh taolo rahmate ʙaroi man ʙixohad, ojo metavonand moneas savand?» Bigu: [Pustiʙonii] Alloh taolo ʙarojam kofi ast. Ahli tavakkal tanho ʙar U tavakkal mekunand»
